mean_cn: n. 吉卜赛人，吉卜赛语；  vi. 像吉卜赛人似的流浪；  adj. 吉卜赛人的，像吉卜赛人的
mean_en: a member of a group of people who originally came from northern India and now live mostly in Asia, Europe, and North America
sentence: Romanies travel from place to place in old-fashioned Gypsy caravans.
sentence_trans: 吉普赛人们坐着传统的吉普赛大篷车四处旅行。
